# ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: MAC Address check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses" "test_posture_check_mac_addresses" {
  name = "test_mac_addresses"
}

output "ziti_check_mac" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_mac_addresses.test_posture_check_mac_addresses
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check

### Read-Only

- `mac_addresses` (List of String) MAC address list
- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags
